projects.name: Learnify
projects.description: A sleek and dynamic website built with Remix, designed to showcase Learnify's innovative web solutions for schools and educational institutions in Kenya. With a modern, responsive UI and fast, seamless navigation, the site offers an engaging experience. It highlights Learnify's services and values, featuring interactive course catalogs, student progress tracking, and real-time analytics dashboards for educators.

projects.name: ShopSmart E-commerce App
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce application built using the MERN stack and Remix. It offers user authentication, product categorization, advanced search filters, cart management, secure payments, and order tracking. The platform supports user reviews and responsive performance for large product catalogs.

projects.name: ThoughtReflex
projects.description: An AI-powered therapy journaling app that helps users process emotions, track mental health, and grow from past traumas. Features include an empathetic AI companion named Mira with three modes (Therapist, Coach, Friend), reflection journaling, and goal suggestions to guide healing.

projects.name: Tevin's Restaurant
projects.description: A restaurant web app allowing users to browse menus, place orders, make reservations, and leave reviews. Includes real-time order tracking, dietary filters, and an interactive admin dashboard for restaurant management and analytics.

projects.name: Graspable Dreams
projects.description: A goal-setting and tracking platform with motivational features. Users can categorize goals, track progress, celebrate milestones, and share achievements. Includes calendar integrations, habit tracking, and insightful data visualizations.

projects.name: MovieStream
projects.description: A movie streaming app using the TMDb API. Features include search, trending titles, personalized recommendations, watchlists, ratings, and cast details. Users can filter by genre, release year, and language with smooth playback support.

projects.name: Weather Application
projects.description: A real-time weather app powered by Remix, TypeScript, and OpenWeather API. It displays live conditions, forecasts, interactive weather maps, and alerts. Users can track multiple locations and view historical data through elegant visualizations.
